鼛鼛鼛

鼛字的基本解释

鼛
gāo
古代有事时用来召集人的一种大鼓：“以鼛鼓鼓役事。”

鼛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gāo］
［《廣韻》古勞切，平豪，见。］
(1)大鼓。古代用于奏乐。
(2)古代用于役事的鼓，长一丈二尺。

鼛字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鼓字部】　鼛； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1526第31
【唐韻】古勞切【集韻】【韻會】居勞切【正韻】姑勞切，?音高。【說文】大鼓也。【廣韻】役事，車鼓長丈二尺。【周禮·地官·鼓人】以鼛鼓鼓役事。【詩·大雅】鼛鼓弗勝。　又本作臯。【周禮·冬官考工記】爲臯鼓，長尋有四尺。　又叶居尤切，音鳩。【詩·小雅】鼓鐘伐鼛，淮有三洲。又?。

鼛字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鼛字的起名意思

暂无。

large drum
Basic explanation of words
large drum
gāo
A kind of drum used to convene people when something happened in ancient times: "Using the tape drum to encourage things."
large drum
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gāo］
["Guangyun" Gu Laoqie, Pinghao, see you. ]
(1) Bass drum. Used for playing music in ancient times.
(2) The drum used for military service in ancient times was one foot and two feet long.
large drum
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Drum Character Department] 　鼛; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1526 31
[Tang Yun] Gu Lao Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Gu Lao Qi [Zheng Yun] Gu Lao Qi,? Pitch. [Said the text] The drum is also. [Guang Yun] Service, the drum is two feet long. 【Zhou Li·Diguan·Guren】Using the tapes and drums to serve. 【Poetry·Daya】Shooting the Drum and Fu Sheng.　This is also made Gao. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji】It is Gao Gu, and Chang Xun is four feet long.　Yeju Yuchi, Otodo. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Drum bells cut down on Yao, Huai has three continents. also?.
large drum
